Package game

Class FoodItem

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
game.PortableItem
game.FoodItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, ItemInterface, Food
Direct Known Subclasses:
Corpse, Egg, Fish, Fruit, MealKitsItem
public abstract class FoodItem
extends PortableItem
implements Food
Base class for all Items that are considered Food

    boolean canEat​(CapableActor capableActor)
    Returns true if the FoodItem is appropriate for the CapableActor's diet, false otherwise
    private void decrementHealPoints​(int decrementBy)
    Decrement the heal points of the FoodItem, while making sure that it stays at least equal to 0.
    int eat​(GameMap map, Location location, int biteSize)
    Simulates DinoActor eating FoodItem, and makes the FoodItem disappear if it is eaten completely, finally returns the amount of food points gained by the eating the FoodItem.

    Returns name of the FoodItem
    int getHealPoints()  
    private boolean isBig()  
    private boolean isSmall()  
    void setBigSize()
    Adjusts the capabilities of the FoodItem, to indicate that it is able to be eaten whole by only DinoActors with big jaws since it is big in size.
    void setForCarnivores()
    Adjusts the capabilities of the FoodItem, so that it is able to be eaten by carnivores.
    void setForHerbivores()
    Adjusts the capabilities of the FoodItem, so that it is able to be eaten by herbivores.
    void setHealPoints​(int newHealPoints)  
    void setSmallSize()
    Adjusts the capabilities of the FoodItem, to indicate that it is able to be eaten whole by any DinoActor since it is small in size.

    • eat

      public int eat​(GameMap map, Location location, int biteSize)
      Simulates DinoActor eating FoodItem, and makes the FoodItem disappear if it is eaten completely, finally returns the amount of food points gained by the eating the FoodItem.
      Specified by:
      eat in interface Food
      Parameters:
      map - map the Actor is on
      location - location the Actor is at
      biteSize - jaw size of the Actor that is trying to eat
      Returns:
      amount of food points that should be gained by eating the FoodItem
